src:
Jelang Hadapi Tira Persikabo, Aji Santoso Mulai Sentuh Taktikal
04 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso mulai memberikan menu latihan taktik kepada para pemainya. Program tersebut merupakan bagian dari persiapan menghadapi PS Tira Persikabo.
Menurut juru taktik asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang tersebut, dirinya menyentuh taktikal lebih awal agar pemain cepat beradaptasi. Mengingat, dia baru bergabung dengan Persebaya.
"Hari ini tadi sudah mengarah ke taktik karena tanggal 9 sudah harus main, saya harus mempersiapkan sedini mungkin," kata Aji Santoso, Senin (4/11/2019).
"Apalagi pemain harus beradaptasi dengan cara main yang saya inginkan, jadi mumpung masih ada waktu akan saya gunakan secara maksimal," sambungnya.
Persebaya akan menghadapi Tira Persikabo, Sabtu (9/11/2019) di Stadion Pakansari, Cibinong. Artinya, Green Force hanya punya waktu lima hari untuk mematangkan persiapan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Ahead of Facing Tira Persikabo, Aji Santoso Begins to Touch Tactically
Nov 04 2019, 21:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya trainer, Aji Santoso began giving tactics training menus to the users. The program is part of the preparation to face PS Tira Persikabo.
According to the interpreter of tactics from Kepanjen, Malang Regency, he touched tactically earlier so that players can quickly adapt. Remember, he just joined Persebaya.
"Today had already led to tactics because the 9th had to play, I must prepare as early as possible," said Aji Santoso, Monday (11/04/2019).
"Moreover, players must adapt to the way I want to play, so while there is still time I will use it to its full potential," he continued.
Persebaya will face Tira Persikabo on Saturday (11/09/2019) at Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong. That is, Green Force only has five days to finalize preparations.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
